name: Civil War II (itch)
description:
Fight against the evil forces of the Axis in this flappy infinite shooter!

This game was made by the Akari Game Art Workshop #02 Team:

  • Ángela Gómez (12 yo), gamer and basketball player. Her favorite games are Fortnite and GTA5, and she also enjoys watching youtubers such as Elrubius or Pewdiepie, and quarreling with her brother. She doesn't like that much going to school and trap music.
  • Héctor Colomo (10 yo), a very cool guy who also loves playing Fortnite (well who doesn't).  He also enjoys spending time with his family and friends, and loves eating too! On the other hand, he doesn't like school very much, nor doing his homework at home.

With collaborations by Christian, Rufino, Benjamín y Sergio.

Project director: guilleDCF
